Text:
Just came across your great 80's torrents!!
Thanks!

Might you have Michael De Barre's 1986 album Somebody Up There Likes Me?
Great stuff, I especially like "Remain in Silence", nice pop-rock-goth style. Thanks again, 80z.

As always I will seed to at least 10:1 in appreciation.
Many thanks and be well. T.

What an exotic compilation. Rare, obscure and forgotten these albums were, but thanks to you 80z they're not any more.
Great work. Your efforts always appreciated.
Cheers.
Thanks for the comments people. back from the trip and back to work! stay tuned.

Hope you had a good trip. Welcome back.
I think there are a lot of us who have missed you.
Eagerly awaiting your next offerings.
Be well. T.
dragonbandit314, I have done some ripping but have not had a chance to seperate/tag the tracks. It's work in progress but it will come soon! Cheers
